summary: 8Bit Chain - 8Bit Chain is a comprehensive DeFi ecosystem that encompasses a wide range of DeFi products and services. It is supported by its own blockchain infrastructure, ensuring a secure, scalable, and efficient foundation. The ecosystem boasts numerous top-notch platforms, including a decentralized fundraising protocol (ProPad), a DeFi exchange (ProDex), an NFT marketplace (ProGallery), an innovative trading platform (ProTracker), audit and KYC protocols (ProAssure), as well as various other products such as ProBridge, DAO, staking DApp, Farming pools etc. Additionally, 8Bit Chain offers various passive income streams to its holders as a token of appreciation for supporting the ecosystem.
